events_categories.title: WEARABLES
events_categories.description: Wearables & Smartwatches with essential utility, leading-edge technologies, compelling features with the highest quality.

events_categories.title: ELECTRONICS
events_categories.description: The possibilities are infinite. Garmin technology goes well beyond GPS. not just in navigation but across an impressive range of infotainment and related  electronics.

events_categories.title: Top products
events_categories.description: We offer products with leading-edge technologies, and exceptional ease-of-use to create clear differentiators our customers appreciate and desire.

allEvents.title: Forerunner® 955 Series
allEvents.description: You train to win and run with the best. Lead the pack with this premium GPS running and triathlon smartwatch.

allEvents.title: Fēnix® 7 Series
allEvents.description: You’re an athlete or adventurer who wants it all: Multisport performance features. Outdoor navigation. 24/7 wearability. This rugged GPS smartwatch series has you covered.

allEvents.title: Epix™
allEvents.description: You live an athletic lifestyle. You need this premium active smartwatch with a stunning AMOLED display to help you overcome every challenge.

allEvents.title: Venu® Series
allEvents.description: You're looking for something bright, colorful, sleek and stylish. A GPS smartwatch that keeps you active and in tune with your body. This one is sure to stand out.

allEvents.title: Forerunner® 255 Series
allEvents.description: You’re serious about running. Step it up with the Forerunner® 255 smartwatch series, the everyday GPS smartwatches that will help you train smarter, recover smarter and run your best race.

allEvents.title: GARMIN DASH CAM™ LIVE
allEvents.description: Access a 24/7 live view from this LTE dash cam when you’re away from your parked vehicle. Get peace of mind with an always-connected dash cam.

allEvents.title: Garmin DriveSmart™ 86
allEvents.description: Whether it’s a family vacation, weekend getaway or your daily commute, the 8” Garmin DriveSmart 86 GPS navigator brings new levels of freedom, convenience and peace of mind to your time on the road. Garmin voice assist helps you easily find and navigate where you want to go.

allEvents.title: Tacx® NEO Bike Plus
allEvents.description: Bring the outdoor world indoors with a smart bike that offers realistic road feel and simulated gradients from actual courses with the Tacx® Training smart-device app1 — plus easy customization to match your outdoor bike fit.

allEvents.title: Fēnix® 7 Series
allEvents.description: You’re an athlete or adventurer who wants it all: Multisport performance features. Outdoor navigation. 24/7 wearability. This rugged GPS smartwatch series has you covered.

allEvents.title: Epix™
allEvents.description: You live an athletic lifestyle. You need this premium active smartwatch with a stunning AMOLED display to help you overcome every challenge.

allEvents.description: Access a 24/7 live view from this LTE dash cam when you’re away from your parked vehicle. Get peace of mind with an always-connected dash cam.
